Package utils

Interface ObjectSerializer<O>

  • public interface ObjectSerializer<O>
    Functional interface to serialize and deserialize a generic object O

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <O> O deserialize​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
      Deserialize an object from a file
      static <O> void serialize​(O obj, java.nio.file.Path filePath)
      Serialize an object o to a file path

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        static <O> void serialize​(O obj,
                          java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Serialize an object o to a file path
        Type Parameters:
        O - The type of the object to serialize.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to serialize.
        filePath - The path to the file to serialize to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file does not exist.

      • deserialize

        static <O> O deserialize​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Deserialize an object from a file
        Type Parameters:
        O - The type of the object to serialize.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file.
        Returns:
        The object deserialized from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file does not exist.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the object is not the same as the one expected.
